item.title: 10 Best Beaches in India for Solo Travelers (Safe, Peaceful & Budget-Friendly Guide)
item.description: Traveling solo is one of the most rewarding experiences in life. It gives you freedom, confidence, space for self-discovery, and the chance to explore at your own pace. India, with its long coastline and diverse coastal landscapes, offers some of the most beautiful and safe beaches for solo travelers.
